description.english: Successfully complete 1,000 medium boards (size of 10 to 13).

description.turkish: 1,000 orta tahtayı başarıyla tamamla (10'dan 13'e boyut).

description.english: Successfully complete 20 large boards (size of 14 to 16).
description.french: Complétez avec succès 20 grands plateaux (de taille 14 à 16).
description.italian: Completa con successo 20 tabelloni grandi (dimensioni da 14 a 16).
description.russian: Успешно завершите 20 больших досок (размер 14-16).
description.turkish: 20 büyük tahtayı başarıyla tamamla (14'ten 16'ya boyut).

description.english: Successfully complete 100 large boards (size of 14 to 16).
description.french: Complétez avec succès 100 grands plateaux (de taille 14 à 16).
description.italian: Completa con successo 100 tabelloni grandi (dimensioni da 14 a 16).
description.russian: Успешно завершите 100 больших досок (размер 14-16).
description.turkish: 100 büyük tahtayı başarıyla tamamla (14'ten 16'ya boyut).

description.english: Successfully complete 500 large boards (size of 14 to 16).
description.french: Complétez avec succès 500 grands plateaux (de taille 14 à 16).
description.italian: Completa con successo 500 tabelloni grandi (dimensioni da 14 a 16).
description.russian: Успешно завершите 500 больших досок (размер 14-16).
description.turkish: 500 büyük tahtayı başarıyla tamamla (14'ten 16'ya boyut).

description.english: Complete levels where all three parameters are the same.
description.french: Terminez les niveaux où les trois paramètres sont identiques.
description.italian: Completa i livelli in cui tutti e tre i parametri sono uguali.
description.russian: Пройдите уровни, где все три параметра одинаковы.
description.turkish: Üç parametresi de aynı olan bölümleri tamamla.

description.english: Complete at least 5 levels for at least 5 languages.
description.french: Terminez au moins 5 niveaux pour au moins 5 langues.
description.italian: Completa almeno 5 livelli per almeno 5 lingue.
description.russian: Пройдите не менее 5 уровней на 5 разных языках.
description.turkish: En az 5 dilde en az 5 seviyeyi tamamlayın.

description.english: Successfully complete a small board (size of 7 to 9) in 10 seconds.
description.french: Terminez un plateau petit (de taille 7 à 9) en 10 secondes.
description.italian: Completa con successo un tabellone piccolo (dimensioni da 7 a 9) in 10 secondi.
description.russian: Успешно завершите маленькую доску (размер 7-9) за 10 секунд.
description.turkish: Küçük bir tahtayı (7'den 9'a boyut) 10 saniyede başarıyla tamamlayın.

description.english: Successfully complete a medium board (size of 10 to 13) in 20 seconds.
description.french: Terminez un plateau moyen (de taille 10 à 13) en 20 secondes.
description.italian: Completa con successo un tabellone medio (dimensioni da 10 a 13) in 20 secondi.
description.russian: Успешно завершите среднюю доску (размер 10-13) за 20 секунд.
description.turkish: Orta bir tahtayı (10'dan 13'e boyut) 20 saniyede başarıyla tamamlayın.

description.english: Successfully complete a large board (size of 14 to 16) in 70 seconds.
description.french: Terminez un plateau grand (de taille 14 à 16) en 70 secondes.
description.italian: Completa con successo un tabellone grande (dimensioni da 14 a 16) in 70 secondi.
description.russian: Успешно завершите большую доску (размер 14-16) за 70 секунд.
description.turkish: Büyük bir tahtayı (14'ten 16'ya boyut) 70 saniyede başarıyla tamamlayın.

description.english: Play the game for at least 1 hour in a single session.
description.french: Jouez au jeu pendant au moins 1 heure en une seule session.
description.italian: Gioca al gioco per almeno 1 ora in una singola sessione.
description.russian: Играйте в игру не менее 1 часа за одну сессию.
description.turkish: Bir oturumda en az 1 saat boyunca oyunu oynayın.

description.english: Play the game for at least 1 hour per day for 3 consecutive days
description.french: Jouez au jeu pendant au moins 1 heure par jour pendant 3 jours consécutifs.
description.italian: Gioca al gioco per almeno 1 ora al giorno per 3 giorni consecutivi.
description.russian: Играйте в игру не менее 1 часа в день на протяжении 3 последовательных дней.
description.turkish: Peşpeşe 3 gün boyunca en az 1 saat oynayın.

description.english: Play the game for at least 1 hour per day for 5 consecutive days
description.french: Jouez au jeu pendant au moins 1 heure par jour pendant 5 jours consécutifs.
description.italian: Gioca al gioco per almeno 1 ora al giorno per 5 giorni consecutivi.
description.russian: Играйте в игру не менее 1 часа в день на протяжении 5 последовательных дней.
description.turkish: Peşpeşe 5 gün boyunca en az 1 saat oynayın.

description.english: Made groundbreaking contributions to the fields of cosmology and quantum gravity, especially in the context of black holes.
description.french: A apporté des contributions révolutionnaires aux domaines de la cosmologie et de la gravité quantique, en particulier dans le contexte des trous noirs.
description.italian: Ha fatto contributi rivoluzionari nei campi della cosmologia e della gravità quantistica, in particolare nel contesto dei buchi neri.
description.russian: Сделал выдающийся вклад в космологию и квантовую гравитацию, особенно в контексте черных дыр.
description.turkish: Kozmoloji ve kuantum yerçekimi alanlarında, özellikle kara delikler bağlamında çığır açan katkılarda bulundu.

description.english: Invented the modern AC electricity supply system.
description.french: Inventé le système moderne d'alimentation électrique en courant alternatif.
description.italian: Inventò il moderno sistema di alimentazione elettrica in corrente alternata.
description.russian: Изобрел систему подачи переменного тока.
description.turkish: Modern AC elektrik sistemini icat etti.

description.english: Made pioneering observations that laid the foundation for modern physics and astronomy.
description.french: Fait des observations fondatrices qui ont jeté les bases de la physique et de l'astronomie modernes.
description.italian: Fece osservazioni pionieristiche che gettarono le basi per la fisica e l'astronomia moderne.
description.russian: Сделал новаторские наблюдения, которые заложили основу современной физики и астрономии.
description.turkish: Modern fizik ve astronominin temelini atan öncü gözlemler yaptı.

description.english: Created the Periodic Table of Elements.
description.french: Créé le tableau périodique des éléments.
description.italian: Creò la Tavola Periodica degli Elementi.
description.russian: Создал Периодическую таблицу элементов.
description.turkish: Periyodik cetveli oluşturdu.

description.english: Formulated the classical theory of electromagnetic radiation.
description.french: Formulé la théorie classique du rayonnement électromagnétique.
description.italian: Formulò la teoria classica della radiazione elettromagnetica.
description.russian: Сформулировал классическую теорию электромагнитного излучения.
description.turkish: Klasik elektromanyetik radyasyon teorisini formüle etti.

description.english: Known for his work in quantum mechanics, quantum electrodynamics, and particle physics.
description.french: Connu pour son travail en mécanique quantique, électrodynamique quantique et physique des particules.
description.italian: Conosciuto per il suo lavoro nella meccanica quantistica, nella elettrodinamica quantistica e nella fisica delle particelle.
description.russian: Известен своей работой в области квантовой механики, квантовой электродинамики и физики частиц.
description.turkish: Kuantum mekaniği, kuantum elektrodinamiği ve parçacık fiziği alanlarındaki çalışmalarıyla tanındı.

description.english: Made significant contributions to quantum mechanics and quantum electrodynamics.
description.french: A apporté des contributions significatives à la mécanique quantique et à l'électrodynamique quantique.
description.italian: Apportò significativi contributi alla meccanica quantistica e alla elettrodinamica quantistica.
description.russian: Внес значительный вклад в квантовую механику и квантовую электродинамику.
description.turkish: Kuantum mekaniği ve kuantum elektrodinamiği alanlarına önemli katkılarda bulundu.

description.english: Known as the 'Father of Modern Pathology.'
description.french: Connu comme le "père de la pathologie moderne".
description.italian: Conosciuto come il 'Padre della Patologia Moderna.'
description.russian: Известен как «отец современной патологии».
description.turkish: Modern patolojinin babası olarak bilinir.

description.english: Pioneer of antiseptic surgery.
description.french: Pionnier de la chirurgie antiseptique.
description.italian: Pioniere della chirurgia antisettica.
description.russian: Пионер антисептической хирургии.
description.turkish: Antiseptik cerrahinin öncüsü.

description.english: Laid the foundation of electrodynamics.
description.french: Jeté les bases de l'électrodynamique.
description.italian: Fondò le basi dell'elettrodinamica.
description.russian: Заложил основы электродинамики.
description.turkish: Elektrodinamiğin temellerini attı.

description.english: Made important discoveries in fields like calculus and graph theory.
description.french: Fait des découvertes importantes dans des domaines comme le calcul et la théorie des graphes.
description.italian: Fece importanti scoperte nei campi del calcolo e della teoria dei grafi.
description.russian: Сделал важные открытия в таких областях, как анализ и теория графов.
description.turkish: Calculus ve graf teorisi gibi alanlarda önemli keşifler yaptı.

description.english: Discovered oxygen.
description.french: Découvert l'oxygène.
description.italian: Scoprì l'ossigeno.
description.russian: Открыл кислород.
description.turkish: Oksijeni keşfetti.

description.english: Discovered hydrogen.
description.french: Découvert l'hydrogène.
description.italian: Scoprì l'idrogeno.
description.russian: Открыл водород.
description.turkish: Hidrojeni keşfetti.

description.english: First King of Italy, leading figure in the unification of Italy.
description.french: Premier roi d'Italie, figure majeure dans l'unification de l'Italie.
description.italian: Primo Re d'Italia, figura di spicco nell'unificazione dell'Italia.
description.russian: Первый король Италии, ведущая фигура в объединении Италии.
description.turkish: İtalya'nın ilk kralı, İtalya'nın birleşmesinde önemli figür.

description.english: Ruled England and Ireland from 1558 until her death, known as the 'Golden Age' of English history.
description.french: A régné sur l'Angleterre et l'Irlande de 1558 jusqu'à sa mort, connue comme l'âge d'or de l'histoire anglaise.
description.italian: Governò l'Inghilterra e l'Irlanda dal 1558 fino alla sua morte, noto come l'età d'oro della storia inglese.
description.russian: Правила Англией и Ирландией с 1558 года до своей смерти, известна как 'Золотой век' английской истории.
description.turkish: İngiltere ve İrlanda'yı yönetti, İngiliz tarihinde altın çağı olarak bilinir.

description.english: President of France (1879-1887), during whose term the French colonial empire expanded significantly.
description.french: Président de la France (1879-1887), sous le mandat duquel l'empire colonial français s'est considérablement élargi.
description.italian: Presidente della Francia (1879-1887), durante il cui mandato l'impero coloniale francese si è notevolmente ampliato.
description.russian: Президент Франции (1879-1887), при котором Французская колониальная империя значительно расширилась.
description.turkish: Fransa Cumhurbaşkanı (1879-1887), görev süresince Fransız sömürge imparatorluğu önemli ölçüde genişlemiştir.

description.english: President of Azerbaijan, played a key role in the country's independence and development.
description.french: Président de l'Azerbaïdjan, a joué un rôle clé dans l'indépendance et le développement du pays.
description.italian: Presidente dell'Azerbaigian, giocò un ruolo chiave nell'indipendenza e nello sviluppo del paese.
description.russian: Президент Азербайджана, сыграл ключевую роль в независимости и развитии страны.
description.turkish: Açıklama: Azerbaycan'ın bağımsızlık ve gelişiminde önemli rol oynayan devlet başkanı.

description.english: Founder of the Republic of Turkey and its first President, known for modernizing reforms.
description.french: Fondateur de la République de Turquie et premier président, connu pour ses réformes modernisatrices.
description.italian: Fondatore della Repubblica di Turchia e suo primo Presidente, noto per le riforme di modernizzazione.
description.russian: Основатель Турецкой Республики и её первый Президент, известен своими модернизационными реформами.
description.turkish: Türkiye Cumhuriyeti'nin kurucusu ve ilk Cumhurbaşkanı, modernleşme reformlarıyla tanınır.

description.english: Led the United States through its Civil War and abolished slavery.
description.french: A mené les États-Unis à travers la guerre civile et a aboli l'esclavage.
description.italian: Guidò gli Stati Uniti attraverso la sua Guerra Civile e abolì la schiavitù.
description.russian: Руководил Соединёнными Штатами во время Гражданской войны и отменил рабство.
description.turkish: ABD'yi iç savaş boyunca yönetti ve köleliği kaldırdı.

description.english: Complete consecutive levels with increasing parameters.
description.french: Complétez les niveaux avec des paramètres croissants consécutifs.
description.italian: Completa i livelli con parametri consecutivamente crescenti.
description.russian: Пройдите подряд уровни с увеличивающимися параметрами.
description.turkish: Ardışık artan parametreli bölümleri tamamla.

description.english: Complete consecutive levels with decreasing parameters.
description.french: Complétez les niveaux avec des paramètres décroissants consécutifs.
description.italian: Completa i livelli con parametri consecutivamente decrescenti.
description.russian: Пройдите подряд уровни с уменьшающимися параметрами.
description.turkish: Ardışık azalan parametreli bölümleri tamamla.

description.english: Complete your first board
description.french: Terminez votre première grille
description.italian: Completa la tua prima scheda
description.russian: Завершите свою первую доску.
description.turkish: İlk tahtanızı tamamlayın

description.english: Renowned Russian novelist, pivotal in world literature for his deep psychological insights.
description.french: Célèbre romancier russe, essentiel dans la littérature mondiale pour ses profondes analyses psychologiques.
description.italian: Famoso romanziere russo, fondamentale nella letteratura mondiale per i suoi profondi approfondimenti psicologici.
description.russian: Знаменитый русский писатель, важный для мировой литературы своими глубокими психологическими прозрениями.
description.turkish: Dünyanın en önemli romancılarından biri olan Rus yazar, derin psikolojik analizleriyle tanınır.

description.english: Romantic composer known for his symphonies, concertos, and chamber works.
description.french: Compositeur romantique connu pour ses symphonies, concertos et œuvres de chambre.
description.italian: Compositore romantico noto per le sue sinfonie, concerti e opere da camera.
description.russian: Композитор-романтик, известный своими симфониями, концертами и камерными произведениями.
description.turkish: Senfonileri, konçertoları ve oda eserleriyle tanınan romantik besteci.

description.english: French composer known for his Requiem and piano works.
description.french: Compositeur français connu pour son Requiem et ses œuvres pour piano.
description.italian: Compositore francese noto per il suo Requiem e le opere per pianoforte.
description.russian: Французский композитор, известный своим "Реквиемом" и фортепианными произведениями.
description.turkish: "Requiem" ve piyano eserleriyle tanınan Fransız besteci.

description.english: Renowned French opera composer of "Manon" and "Werther."
description.french: Célèbre compositeur d'opéra français, auteur de "Manon" et "Werther".
description.italian: Rinomato compositore d'opera francese, autore di "Manon" e "Werther".
description.russian: Известный французский композитор опер, автор "Манон" и "Вертер".
description.turkish: "Manon" ve "Werther" operalarının ünlü Fransız bestecisi.

description.english: Russian composer known for "Pictures at an Exhibition."
description.french: Compositeur russe connu pour "Tableaux d'une exposition."
description.italian: Compositore russo conosciuto per "Quadri di un'esposizione."
description.russian: Русский композитор, известный по "Картинкам с выставки."
description.turkish: "Bir Sergiden Tablolar" ile tanınan Rus besteci.

description.english: French composer famous for "The Carnival of the Animals."
description.french: Compositeur français célèbre pour "Le Carnaval des animaux".
description.italian: Compositore francese famoso per "Il carnevale degli animali".
description.russian: Французский композитор, известный "Карнавалом животных".
description.turkish: "Hayvanlar Karnavalı" ile ünlü Fransız besteci.

description.english: Composer and pianist, influential in Romantic-era music.
description.french: Compositrice et pianiste, influente dans la musique de l'époque romantique.
description.italian: Compositrice e pianista, influente nella musica dell'epoca romantica.
description.russian: Композитор и пианистка, влиятельная фигура в музыке эпохи романтизма.
description.turkish: Romantik dönemin müziğinde etkili olan besteci ve piyanist.

description.english: Composer known for his tone poems and operas like "Salome."
description.french: Compositeur connu pour ses poèmes symphoniques et ses opéras comme "Salomé."
description.italian: Compositore noto per i suoi poemi sinfonici e opere come "Salomè."
description.russian: Композитор, известный своими симфоническими поэмами и операми, такими как "Саломея."
description.turkish: "Salome" gibi ton şiirleri ve operalarıyla tanınan besteci.

description.english: Russian composer famed for his ballets, symphonies, and concertos.
description.french: Compositeur russe célèbre pour ses ballets, symphonies et concertos.
description.italian: Compositore russo famoso per i suoi balletti, sinfonie e concerti.
description.russian: Русский композитор, прославившийся своими балетами, симфониями и концертами.
description.turkish: Bale, senfoni ve konçertolarıyla ünlü Rus besteci.

description.english: American writer and poet, famous for his gothic tales and pioneering work in detective fiction.
description.french: Écrivain et poète américain, célèbre pour ses contes gothiques et son travail pionnier dans la fiction policière.
description.italian: Scrittore e poeta americano, famoso per i suoi racconti gotici e il lavoro pionieristico nella narrativa poliziesca.
description.russian: Американский писатель и поэт, знаменитый своими готическими рассказами и новаторской работой в детективной прозе.
description.turkish: Gotik hikayeleri ve dedektif kurgudaki öncü çalışmaları ile ünlü Amerikalı yazar ve şair.

description.english: Irish avant-garde novelist, playwright, and poet, best known for "Waiting for Godot."
description.french: Romancier, dramaturge et poète irlandais d'avant-garde, surtout connu pour "En attendant Godot."
description.italian: Romanziere, drammaturgo e poeta irlandese d'avanguardia, noto soprattutto per "Aspettando Godot."
description.russian: Ирландский авангардный романист, драматург и поэт, наиболее известный "В ожидании Годо."
description.turkish: "Godot'yu Beklerken" ile tanınan İrlandalı avangart romancı, oyun yazarı ve şair.

description.english: Russian author, best known for his novel "The Master and Margarita."
description.french: Auteur russe, surtout connu pour son roman "Le Maître et Marguerite."
description.italian: Autore russo, noto soprattutto per il suo romanzo "Il Maestro e Margherita."
description.russian: Русский писатель, наиболее известный своим романом "Мастер и Маргарита."
description.turkish: En çok "Usta ile Margarita" romanıyla tanınan Rus yazar.

description.english: French philosopher and writer, notable for his works on existentialism and absurdism, such as "The Stranger."
description.french: Philosophe et écrivain français, notable pour ses œuvres sur l'existentialisme et l'absurde, comme "L'Étranger".
description.italian: Filosofo e scrittore francese, noto per i suoi lavori sull'esistenzialismo e l'assurdismo, come "Lo straniero".
description.russian: Французский философ и писатель, известный своими работами по экзистенциализму и абсурдизму, такими как "Посторонний".
description.turkish: Varoluşçuluk ve absürdizm üzerine eserleriyle tanınan Fransız filozof ve yazar, "Yabancı" gibi.

description.english: Russian playwright and short-story writer, noted for "The Cherry Orchard."
description.french: Dramaturge et nouvelliste russe, connu pour "La Cerisaie".
description.italian: Drammaturgo e scrittore di racconti russo, noto per "Il giardino dei ciliegi".
description.russian: Русский драматург и писатель, известный пьесой "Вишнёвый сад".
description.turkish: "Vişne Bahçesi" ile tanınan Rus oyun yazarı ve kısa hikaye yazarı.

description.english: English novelist and social critic, famous for "A Tale of Two Cities" and "Oliver Twist."
description.french: Romancier et critique social anglais, célèbre pour "Le Conte de deux cités" et "Oliver Twist".
description.italian: Romanziere e critico sociale inglese, famoso per "Racconto di due città" e "Oliver Twist".
description.russian: Английский романист и социальный критик, известный произведениями "Повесть о двух городах" и "Оливер Твист".
description.turkish: "İki Şehrin Hikayesi" ve "Oliver Twist" ile ünlü İngiliz romancı ve sosyal eleştirmen.

description.english: English writer, recognized as a pioneer of science fiction.
description.french: Écrivain anglais, reconnu comme un pionnier de la science-fiction.
description.italian: Scrittore inglese, riconosciuto come pioniere della fantascienza.
description.russian: Английский писатель, признанный пионером научной фантастики.
description.turkish: Bilim kurgu türünün öncülerinden olarak kabul edilen İngiliz yazar.

description.english: Irish modernist writer, best known for "Ulysses."
description.french: Écrivain moderniste irlandais, surtout connu pour "Ulysse".
description.italian: Scrittore modernista irlandese, noto soprattutto per "Ulisse".
description.russian: Ирландский модернистский писатель, наиболее известный "Улиссом".
description.turkish: İrlandalı modernist yazar, "Ulysses" ile tanınır.

description.english: English poet and intellectual, renowned for his epic poem "Paradise Lost."
description.french: Poète et intellectuel anglais, renommé pour son poème épique "Le Paradis perdu".
description.italian: Poeta e intellettuale inglese, rinomato per il suo poema epico "Il Paradiso perduto".
description.russian: Английский поэт и мыслитель, прославившийся своим эпическим поэмой "Потерянный рай".
description.turkish: "Kaybolmuş Cennet" adlı epik şiiriyle tanınan İngiliz şair ve entelektüel.

description.english: Russian poet, playwright, and novelist, considered the founder of modern Russian literature.
description.french: Poète, dramaturge et romancier russe, considéré comme le fondateur de la littérature russe moderne.
description.italian: Poeta, drammaturgo e romanziere russo, considerato il fondatore della letteratura russa moderna.
description.russian: Русский поэт, драматург и романист, считающийся основателем современной русской литературы.
description.turkish: Modern Rus edebiyatının kurucusu olarak kabul edilen Rus şair, oyun yazarı ve romancı.

description.english: Scottish novelist, poet, and travel writer, best known for "Treasure Island."
description.french: Romancier, poète et écrivain voyageur écossais, surtout connu pour "L'Île au trésor."
description.italian: Romanziere, poeta e scrittore di viaggi scozzese, noto soprattutto per "L'Isola del Tesoro."
description.russian: Шотландский романист, поэт и путешественник, наиболее известный по "Острову сокровищ."
description.turkish: En çok "Define Adası" ile tanınan İskoç romancı, şair ve seyahat yazarı.

description.english: Russian author of "War and Peace" and "Anna Karenina."
description.french: Auteur russe de "Guerre et Paix" et "Anna Karenine."
description.italian: Autore russo di "Guerra e Pace" e "Anna Karenina."
description.russian: Русский автор "Войны и мира" и "Анны Карениной."
description.turkish: "Anna Karenina" ve "Savaş ve Barış"ın yazarı Rus yazar.

description.english: Dutch Golden Age painter known for his portraits and use of light and shadow.
description.french: Peintre de l'âge d'or néerlandais connu pour ses portraits et l'utilisation de la lumière et de l'ombre.
description.italian: Pittore dell'età dell'oro olandese noto per i suoi ritratti e l'uso della luce e dell'ombra.
description.russian: Голландский художник золотого века, известный своими портретами и использованием света и тени.
description.turkish: Portreleri ve ışık ve gölge kullanımıyla tanınan Hollanda Altın Çağı ressamı.

description.english: Founder of French Impressionism, known for his series of water lilies and other landscapes.
description.french: Fondateur de l'impressionnisme français, connu pour sa série de nénuphars et autres paysages.
description.italian: Fondatore dell'impressionismo francese, noto per la sua serie di ninfee e altri paesaggi.
description.russian: Основатель французского импрессионизма, известный своими сериями картин с водяными лилиями и другими пейзажами.
description.turkish: Fransız empresyonizminin kurucusu, nilüfer ve diğer manzara serileriyle tanınır.

description.english: Prominent Surrealist artist known for his dreamlike and bizarre imagery, such as in The Persistence of Memory
description.french: Artiste surréaliste de renom, connu pour ses images oniriques et bizarres, comme dans "La Persistance de la mémoire."
description.italian: Rinomato artista surrealista noto per le sue immagini oniriche e bizzarre, come ne "La Persistenza della memoria."
description.russian: Выдающийся сюрреалист, известный своими сновидческими и странными образами, как в "Постоянство памяти."
description.turkish: "Belleğin Azmi" gibi rüya gibi ve tuhaf imgeleriyle tanınan önde gelen sürrealist sanatçı.

description.english: Spanish Romantic painter and printmaker, considered the last of the Old Masters and the first of the moderns.
description.french: Peintre et graveur romantique espagnol, considéré comme le dernier des anciens maîtres et le premier des modernes.
description.italian: Pittore e incisore romantico spagnolo, considerato l'ultimo degli antichi maestri e il primo dei moderni.
description.russian: Испанский романтический художник и гравёр, считается последним из старых мастеров и первым из современных.
description.turkish: İspanyol Romantik ressam ve baskı ustası, son klasik usta ve ilk modernlerden biri olarak kabul edilir.

description.english: French sculptor considered the progenitor of modern sculpture, known for The Thinker.
description.french: Sculpteur français considéré comme le précurseur de la sculpture moderne, connu pour Le Penseur.
description.italian: Scultore francese considerato il progenitore della scultura moderna, noto per Il Pensatore.
description.russian: Французский скульптор, считающийся родоначальником современной скульптуры, известен "Мыслителем".
description.turkish: "Düşünen Adam" ile tanınan modern heykelciliğin öncüsü kabul edilen Fransız heykeltıraş.

description.english: Abstract artist and art theorist, considered a pioneer of abstract art.
description.french: Artiste abstrait et théoricien de l'art, considéré comme un pionnier de l'art abstrait.
description.italian: Artista astratto e teorico dell'arte, considerato un pioniere dell'arte astratta.
description.russian: Абстрактный художник и теоретик искусства, считающийся пионером абстрактного искусства.
description.turkish: Soyut sanatın öncüsü olarak kabul edilen soyut sanatçı ve sanat teorisyeni.

description.english: American painter and printmaker associated with the Impressionist movement, known for her depictions of women and children.
description.french: Peintre et graveuse américaine associée au mouvement impressionniste, connue pour ses représentations de femmes et d'enfants.
description.italian: Pittrice e incisore americana associata al movimento impressionista, nota per le sue raffigurazioni di donne e bambini.
description.russian: Американская художница и график, ассоциируемая с импрессионистским движением, известная своими изображениями женщин и детей.
description.turkish: İzlenimcilik hareketiyle ilişkilendirilen Amerikalı ressam ve baskı sanatçısı, kadın ve çocuk tasvirleriyle tanınır.

description.english: French Realist painter who challenged the traditional subjects of art with his depictions of everyday life.
description.french: Peintre réaliste français qui a défié les sujets traditionnels de l'art avec ses représentations de la vie quotidienne.
description.italian: Pittore realista francese che sfidò i soggetti tradizionali dell'arte con le sue rappresentazioni della vita quotidiana.
description.russian: Французский художник-реалист, бросивший вызов традиционным сюжетам искусства своими изображениями повседневной жизни.
description.turkish: Fransız realist ressam, sanatın geleneksel konularını gündelik yaşamı betimlemeleriyle sorgulamıştır.

description.english: Russian avant-garde artist and founder of Suprematism, known for his abstract works like Black Square.
description.french: Artiste d'avant-garde russe et fondateur du suprématisme, connu pour ses œuvres abstraites comme "Carré noir".
description.italian: Artista d'avanguardia russo e fondatore del suprematismo, noto per le sue opere astratte come "Quadrato nero".
description.russian: Русский авангардный художник и основатель супрематизма, известный своими абстрактными работами, такими как "Черный квадрат".
description.turkish: Rus avangard sanatçı ve Soyutlama'nın kurucusu, "Siyah Kare" gibi soyut eserleriyle tanınır.

description.english: Danish-French Impressionist and Neo-Impressionist painter known for his rural and urban scenes.
description.french: Peintre impressionniste et néo-impressionniste dano-français connu pour ses scènes rurales et urbaines.
description.italian: Pittore impressionista e neo-impressionista franco-danese, noto per le sue scene rurali e urbane.
description.russian: Датско-французский импрессионист и неоимпрессионист, известный своими сельскими и городскими сценами.
description.turkish: Kırsal ve kentsel sahneleriyle tanınan Danimarka-Fransız İzlenimci ve Neo-İzlenimci ressam.
